UMLS
====

* Installation
  * I wanted to use UMLS::Similarity for some application.

    * Download the required material from `here <https://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/licensedcontent/downloads.html>`__
    * Nice installation instructions are given `here <http://groups.csail.mit.edu/medg/projects/text/Load_UMLS_mysql.html>`__
    * Python wrapper `here <https://github.com/OHDSI/KnowledgeBase>`__
